TopicTitle: Jebediah Does A Fly-By To A Extraterrestrial Moon

Articles.Content:
...In a spaceplane!

I made this little picture by taking a screenshot in celestia, erased the UI, then took a screenshot in Kerbal Space Program, rescaled the spaceplane, and erased most of the peices of the skybox.

I'm quite proud of it, too!
good good...now he have to wait 5 light years till he reach to Kerbin
